sentences.english: Kiss the sky --- Zhang said after.
The sky is blue and fields are green and laughter is the language of the world.
sentences.chinese: 藍天碧草之間笑聲成了世亖界通用的語言。

sentences.english: Blue sky to secure them, Yin three hid in the hotel yard.
sentences.chinese: 爲保安全，尹三將藍天藏在旅館後院裏。

sentences.english: Red and bright, hanging in the sky.
So lange as it is sunny, there are always white clouds in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 在慕尼黑，只要天晴的時候，總是能夠看見藍天白雲。

sentences.english: We are living in the same planet, having the same blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 我們生活在同一個地球，擁有同一片藍天。

sentences.english: Here by "the red tile greenery, the blue sea blue sky" is celebrated worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 這裏以“紅瓦綠樹，碧海藍天”著稱於世。

sentences.english: Bees are busy working and birds are singing in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂忙着工作，小鳥在藍天中歌唱。

sentences.english: My dream city is the one with red tiling, green trees, blue sea and clear sky.
sentences.chinese: 就是紅瓦綠樹碧海藍天，我就覺得挺好的。

sentences.english: The tiny little skylark stroked the daisy, and flew away to the wide and blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 小云雀撫摸着小雛菊，帶着她飛向廣闊的藍天。

sentences.english: City sights, neon lights, grey skys or blue.
sentences.chinese: 都市景色，霓虹燈光，灰或藍天。

sentences.english: Why can't I fly like a bird in the blue sky?
sentences.chinese: 我爲什麼不能像小鳥一樣在藍天上自由自在地翱翔呢？

sentences.english: The plane is flying high in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 飛機在高高的藍天上飛翔。

sentences.english: The sun glared out of the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 藍天上太陽發出耀眼的光芒。

sentences.english: Once there were blue skies, with white clouds high above.
sentences.chinese: 曾經，這兒有藍天，白雲高高懸掛。

sentences.english: Chao an Blue Sky Sanitaryware Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 潮安縣藍天陶瓷有限公司。

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
